statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Arabian Mocha coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${10.60} per pound with some Organic Free Trade coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${11.30} per pound to create \displaystyle{90} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${10.83} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
pounds of Organic Free Trade coffee.
